revised_title: Behavior of Phase Saddles and Dislocations in Two-Dimensional Waves
tldr: This article explores the behavior of phase saddles and dislocations in two-dimensional waves, such as tides. It examines their topological features, interactions, and restrictions on their movement under external parameters. The study focuses on the conservation of topological indices and the phase's singularities, providing insights into wavefront healing and the annihilation of dislocations.
